page.title: 07ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: ARMADALE HAS A LOCAL{FOOTBALL}TEAM WHO PLAY ON SATURDAYS AT THE VOLUNTEER PARK. ALSO THERE IS A TRACK AT THE EAST END OF THE TOWN USED FOR{GREYHOUND {RACING}WHICH TAKES PLACE EACH MONDAY AND THURSDAY.{STOCK CAR}RACING TAKES PLACE ON FRIDAYS AND SATURDAYS. FOR SOME YOUNGER PEOPLE THERE IS A {B.M.X TRACK}TO THE NORTH OF THE CROSS. FOR PEOPLE WHO ENJOY SLOWER GAMES THERE ARE{BOWLING GREENS,}ONE INDOORS AND TWO OUTDOORS. AT NIGHT THERE ARE SOME DISCOS, ONE EAST OF THE CROSS AND ONE SOUTH OF THE CROSS.DINNER DANCES ARE HELD IN LOCAL HOTELS AND SOCIAL CLUBS LIKE THE MASONIC ARMS,MASONS CLUB,THE GOTH AND THE HIGHLANDER HOTEL. THE MOST POPULAR {RESTAURANT}IS THE MADEIRA MAR WHICH IS AT THE CROSS.
